exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) HP : forall n : nat, P n <-> (exists k : nat, n = f k) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y f_smono : forall x y : nat, x < y -> f x < f y f_ge_n : forall n : nat, n <= f n unbounded : forall n : nat, exists k : nat, n <= k /\\ P k n : nat Hn : n > f n contra : P n k : nat Hle : n <= k HPk : P k Unable to unify "n > f n" with "False".

In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) HP : forall n : nat, P n <-> (exists k : nat, n = f k) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y f_smono : forall x y : nat, x < y -> f x < f y f_ge_n : forall n : nat, n <= f n unbounded : forall n : nat, exists k : nat, n <= k /\\ P k n : nat Hn : n > f n contra : P n k : nat Hle : n <= k HPk : P k Unable to unify "n <= k" with "False".

In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) HP : forall n : nat, P n <-> (exists k : nat, n = f k) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y f_smono : forall x y : nat, x < y -> f x < f y f_ge_n : forall n : nat, n <= f n unbounded : forall n : nat, exists k : nat, n <= k /\\ P k n : nat Hn : n > f n contra : P n k : nat Hle : n <= k HPk : P k Unable to unify "P n" with "False".

In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) HP : forall n : nat, P n <-> (exists k : nat, n = f k) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y f_smono : forall x y : nat, x < y -> f x < f y f_ge_n : forall n : nat, n <= f n unbounded : forall n : nat, exists k : nat, n <= k /\\ P k n : nat Hn : n > f n contra : P n k : nat Hle : n <= k HPk : P k H : forall n : nat, P n -> exists k : nat, n = f k Unable to unify "exists k : nat, ?M1434 = f k" with "False".
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

original: destruct (le_gt_dec n (f n)) as [Hn | Hn]. - left. split. + auto. + intros [k [H1 H2]]. apply Hn. rewrite H2. apply f_ge_n. - right. intro contra. destruct (unbounded n) as [k [Hle HPk]]. apply Hn. apply Hle. apply contra. apply HP. exists k. auto.
